title.rendered: LAWS/Blakes law firm mentoring program wins Lexpert Zenith Award

content.rendered: The LAWS/Blakes Law Firm Mentoring Program Program was recognised with a 2011 Lexpert Zenith Award in September 2011! The program was the highest-level winner  in the Innovative Student Program Non-Law Student category. Zeniths are annual national awards that honour law firms, in-house departments and law students who are committing their time, skills and mentorship to corporate and law firm social responsibility.
